pageContext.collection_title: Administrative Records of the Lowell Institute CoÂ­operative Broadcasting Council (LICBC) and WGBH Educational Foundation
pageContext.collection_description: Contains papers relating to the creation, broadcast and promotion of WGBH's programming and the development of related print and multimedia materials. The records also relate to the development of the LICBC and WGBH-FM/WGBH-TV and to some extent the development of public radio.
